languageKey.label: Options for Semantic Templates
LESS HTML template to show
The list of templates is automatically fetched from the LESS instance you configured (either system-wide or in the "Basic settings" tab).
Published version of the template
A template may be changed several times. You can stick to a certain version if you know it works for you.
URL with the RDF data
The selected template will be filled with data from this URL
URL of the SPARQL service
If left empty, the configured global SPARQL endpoint URL will be used.
Additional data for the template
You may pass additional data to the template. They will be treated as if the were from the RDF file/SPARQL result
Each parameter-value pair is on a line of its own. Name and value are separated with a colon ":" from each other, i.e. name:value
URL of your LESS installation.
If you do not have one, try http://less.aksw.org/. When not given, the configured global LESS URL will be used.
